metadata.name: Net WebClient Casing Anomalies
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell command line contents that include a suspicious abnormal casing in the Net.Webclient (e.g. nEt.WEbCliEnT) string as used in obfuscation techniques

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tgblafqalgb3aeuaqg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('4azqbuac4adwbfaeia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaguavaauahcarqbca')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bgbfahqalgb3aguayg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('4arqb0ac4adwblagia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uaeuadaauahcazqbia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tgbfahqalgb3aguayg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaeuadaauahcazqbia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bgblafqalgb3aguayg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('4azqbuac4adwblagia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('uaguavaauahcazqbia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tgblafqalgb3aguayg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line),
